answerOptions.answerText: A server-side programming language
A JavaScript library for building user interfaces
A database management system
A front-end framework for building responsive web applications

correctAnswer: A JavaScript library for building user interfaces

answerOptions.answerText: A programming language
A preprocessor that adds XML syntax to JavaScript
A framework for building user interfaces
A server-side scripting language

correctAnswer: A preprocessor that adds XML syntax to JavaScript

questionText: What is the Virtual DOM in React?

answerOptions.answerText: A browser-specific implementation of the DOM
A server-side implementation of the DOM
A lightweight representation of the actual DOM in memory
A JavaScript library for manipulating the DOM

correctAnswer: A lightweight representation of the actual DOM in memory

questionText: What is the purpose of state in React?

answerOptions.answerText: To hold global data that can be accessed across components
To store data that can be modified within a component
To store data that is constant and cannot be modified
To store data that is passed from a parent component to a child component

correctAnswer: To store data that can be modified within a component

questionText: What is the purpose of props in React?

answerOptions.answerText: To hold global data that can be accessed across components
To store data that can be modified within a component
To store data that is constant and cannot be modified
To pass data from a parent component to a child component

correctAnswer: To pass data from a parent component to a child component
